item.title: About Me
item.description: Hongxueyang (Sharon) Zheng Hometown: Tsingtao, China/ Richmond, TX Undergrad Institutes: Sun Yat-sen University (Gunagzhou, China)/ University of Wisconsin-Madison (Madison, WI) Master’s Institute: Cornell University (Ithaca, NY) Majors I have taken: Material Science and Engineering; Mathematics; Economics; Financial Engineering Future Field: Financial Quantitative Analysis; Crypto; High Frequency Trading Contact Info: email: hz295@cornell.edu
